name: Double Guns
description:
Get your guns ready!

Shoot the target to break it. Time your shots right and keep the item on screen, otherwise you lose! Focus the firepower just right and break through everything!

Complete the levels to unlock all kinds of items to break: burger, TV, avocado, ukulele - you name it! Win coins in slot machine and unlock new types of guns!

Master your skills and become the ultimate sharpshooter!
